lead_paragraph: Driving the decision is the fact that Americans are losing their taste for diet sodas and the perception by consumers that the sweetener is not safe.

headline.print_headline: Pepsi Drops Aspartame From Diet Pepsi Varieties
headline.main: Pepsi Drops Aspartame From Diet Pepsi Varieties

snippet: Driving the decision is the fact that Americans are losing their taste for diet sodas and the perception by consumers that the sweetener is not safe.
abstract: PepsiCo announces it will replace aspartame with sucralose, another artificial sweetener, in Diet Pepsi formula to respond to customer concerns.
